page.title: 19ASHLING CRICKET CLUB
page.content: Ashling ground is leased for a rent of twelve pounds a year. There are approximately thirty playing members in the club and twenty eight vice presidents who donate to the club. { Cricket}has been played in the village for many years and one family has been connected with the club for over sixty years. The club play about thirty weekend matches including fixtures against a London touring side called "magpie" connected with the T.V. programme.A number of evening matches are also played and there is a single wicket competition played annually. All of the matches are{friendlies}and the majority of players live in the locality,
